description: Try our easy to follow Meatball Sub With Slaw & Chutney recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sandwich,Zucchini,High fibre,High protein,Mince,Quick & easy lunch,Low sugar,Beef
name: Meatball Sub With Slaw & Chutney Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch flat-leaf parsley, chopped (plus parsley leaves, to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Grate onion and zucchini and squeeze out excess moisture. Combine in a large bowl with mince, egg, breadcrumbs, oregano and 2 tbs chutney, mixing together well with your hands. Roll into 16 balls.
Heat cup oil in a large frying pan. Cook meatballs, turning frequently for 8-10 minutes until browned and cooked through.
Whisk remaining oil, vinegar and mustard in a large bowl. Add fennel, parsley and parmesan. Season to taste and toss gently to combine.
Fill rolls with fennel slaw, meatballs and chutney, and sprinkle with parsley leaves. Serve immediately with extra slaw on the side.
